revised_title: Obituary Notices of Distinguished Surgeons and Scientists
tldr: This article is a collection of obituary notices for several notable surgeons and scientists, including Sir John Eric Erichsen, James Augustus Salter, and Dr. George Harley. It highlights their contributions to the fields of surgery, physiology, and medical history, as well as their personal achievements and impact on the medical community.
scientific_discipline: Medicine and Health Sciences > Medical History
